section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: acosh calculates the inverse hyperbolic cosine of x. acosh is defined as x must be a number greater than or equal to 1. acoshf is identical, other than taking and returning floats.

section.title: Returns
section.p: acosh and acoshf return the calculated value. If x less than 1, the return value is NaN and errno is set to EDOM. You can change the error-handling behavior with the non-ANSI matherr function.
